transcript: whether you're trying to get into law or you're trying to get into accounting or you're trying to get into video editing or you're trying to get into sales or you're trying to get into marketing whatever the core activity that you do making videos making ads writing sales Pages actually doing sales calls whatever it is if you do two times or four times the volume you will get better faster and pay down your ignorance debt at a faster rate that can't bounds Kobe Bryant was famous for doing this where he would do two practices a day and he thought if everybody else does one practice today I will get better faster and in the beginning the difference is not that notice but after 5 years and then 10 years he becomes unbeatable he has compounded the number of hours in the trenches learning the thing
